title: Can we have a Sterak's Gage version to the Tanks?
body:
{{item:3053}} is a very cool new item that perform very well on that tanks that what to engage, give like a "second wind" but sadly only works with some of them that causes "physical" damage or have good sinergy with the AD stat.

So I think so, that we need another item like this but it need to works with all the AP tank champs, because we have a lot of them that can engage better with a item like this.
{{champion:32}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:154}} 


Maybe {{champion:201}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:14}} too.

So pls Rito made another version of {{item:3053}} that help all the Tanks.

I think in something like this:

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Sterak's Will:

{{item:1011}} +{{item:1028}} +1150g

Stats
+550 health.
+10% bonus health.

UNIQUE: Upon taking at least 400 to 1800 damage (based on level) within 5 seconds, gain STERAK'S FURY for 8 seconds (45 second cooldown).
STERAK'S FURY: Grow in size and** resistance, gaining increased size, +15% damage reduction, 10% Tenacity** and a rapidly decaying shield for 30% of your maximum health.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

We need to use the same Sterak Fury passive to avoid stack with the other Sterak item,  but the idea is give more longevity to the tank junglers, right now most of them decay in performance in the late game, so this item can push a little bit.

So please Rito, makes more items diversity to every class, becausenot only juggernauts needs items, the Tanks needs more love and "late game power"  too.

replies.body: i agree in that tanks in general just die way too fast. it doesnt need to be an offensive/defensive item like fighters got, but a purely defensive item with something similar to steraks shield passive would kinda make sense.
Thanks, and yes It's most like something purely defensive than an offensive one. The idea is that they try to survive a little bit more.
Sounds neat. And I can't say I dislike the idea of another item that actually gives tenacity.

Its a purely defensive items, its like a second wind to the tanks, also can bring some extra hp without the needed of Cinderhulk, so some laners can use too, I'll been thinking about this, and can be the solution to the poorly late game of the tanks..
please don't
Why no? can you give your reasons please.

because AP tanks don't have itemization problems and they don't need to be harder to kill

where the AD tanks/juggernauts bring damage, every single AP tank has MUCH more CC and some of them still pack a nasty punch themselves.

The idea is not a damage item, is something that allow the tank junglers to survive better in the late game, just check all the stats of the Tanks right now, if you do, you can notice that all of them decay hard in late game, just compare with the juggernauts one, the difference is huge... So I play a lot of tanks, and with all the defense items nerf, and with items like {{item:3800}}, {{item:3143}} , {{item:3075}}  and {{item:3725}} nerfed  too hard, they have problems, so a Sterak's Gage version can be the solution to this problems, Also I completly disagree with you, the itemization of the tank is not in the best spot right now...

why you say AP? I refer to tanks in general not AP...

Also Mundo can use the AD from Sterak's just fine. Masochism gives him AD, so he's going to be auto attacking.

Yes you are right, Mundo can use Gages, but this version fit better on him, and when I saY AP, I refer to the champs that doesn't sinergyze very well with the Gages one. The topic here is if Mundo is or not an AP tank, if that we need an item that help the true tanks (no juggernaut) to survive better in late game...

Seems like way too much of a generically tanky item, and that is kind of a bad thing. It seems like the kind of thing I'd always want every single game I wanted to be tanky, no matter the circumstance. I mean, what's my argument for not building this item?

That may sound like a silly question, but I do think an important facet of defensive itemization is that every option has a situation when something else is superior, and I legitimately can't see any reason to not build this item every game on every tank. I'm trying to think of alot of different games, and I'm having a very hard time finding one where I wouldn't get this item. Major damage reduction, lots of flat health, a shield to help keep you from getting bursted, tenacity. What's not to love?

I like the concept of having more tank items, but I think they should all still have situational purposes. This being a generic "always buy this" kind of item doesn't seem good for the game. Maybe with numbers tuning?

Well, maybe with "numbers tuning" but the tanks need better itemization. Although we have a lot of items with that "characteristic" of "always build", so it's no the first time that this happen with a specific item.

>Although we have a lot of items with that "characteristic" of "always build",

For defensive itemization, that's generally a problem. One of the big characteristics of defensive itemization is that it gets adapted to specific enemies. Having the strongest potential option be one that works against absolutely everyone and fits every situation completely screws that idea.

Even for offensive items it's not a good thing, but there is at least the hint of giving up some kind of defense or utility when you get the highest AD or AP item (deathcap certainly isn't keeping you alive). There is nothing given up here. Get it as a second or third item once you've already secured CDR or a specific resistance, and you get absolutely everything you want by having this. It's a 1 stop perfect tank item. That's not good design.

> tanks need better itemization.

Sure. I just don't think this is the answer.
I don't see too "perfect" like you say, also the tweak numbers can fix it...

It's pretty perfect. If you had some resistances from other items, then what doesn't it do for you? It's also why I'm not sure the item could be tweaked. When are you theoretically supposed to not buy this item? I'm not seeing any negative situations.
That´s is the idea, the item need to be a "must" on every tank

That's bad design for a defensive item. Defensive itemization is reliant on adaptability. Having a 1-stop answer for any defensive problem is not good design. Having it almost completely negate threats of burst with a combination of a shield and damage reduction is not great design either. It should not solve every problem at the moment you pick it up, and that's exactly what it does right now.

It isn't just tanks who love this item either. Any fighter could use this too. The bonus health scaling is the only thing that makes this a tank item, and that is the least important part of the item. I'd gladly grab this as a perfect defensive item on any fighter that didn't have total AD ratios.

Well I don't suggest this item like the solution, obviusly I'm not an expert, but I want something like that with bonus health, tenacity, health that give an extra push to all the tans in late game, maybe you can share your ideas about a good defensive tank item...
AP tanks already have amazing itemization {{item:3027}}  {{item:3116}} {{item:3157}} AD tanks were the ones who were left out since they had no items to mix damage and defense.
